title: Brand Pilotfree: 300 % Growth in 90 Days
subtitle: How a niche DTC startup exploded with data‑driven creative and micro‑pivot loops.
author: Laura Patel

sections.heading: Setting the Stage
sections.content: Brand Pilotfree came to us with a fantastic product and a stagnant social presence...

sections.heading: Tactic Stack
sections.content: We deployed rapid‑fire A/B tests (50+ in two weeks), hyper‑segmented paid funnels, and community seeding on Discord...
sections.quote: “Our hook‑rate jumped from 10 % to 38 % after the first creative pivot.”

sections.heading: Results
sections.content: 90‑day highlights: 300 % lift in CTR, 2.5× ROAS, 3× follower engagement...

sections.heading: Challenges Faced
sections.content: Brand X struggled with fragmented messaging, inconsistent visual identity, and poor retention despite strong initial reach. They lacked unified KPIs and their analytics stack was underutilized.

sections.heading: Solutions Deployed
sections.content: We integrated cross-platform analytics, set up centralized dashboards, and established a single source of truth for KPIs. The creative strategy was realigned to emphasize storytelling and emotional triggers.

title: Brew Co: From Local Roaster to Viral Coffee Darling
subtitle: A brand refresh, TikTok storytelling, and influencer collabs brewed a global fan‑base.
author: Marcus Jin

sections.heading: Re‑Brand Sprint
sections.content: We overhauled packaging, color palette, and voice—leaning into quirky latte art memes...

sections.heading: Influencer Cascade
sections.content: Seven micro‑influencers seeded the first wave; then TikTok’s coffee niche did the heavy lift...
sections.quote: “Brew Co went from 8K to 120K followers in 30 days.”

sections.heading: Key Metrics
sections.content: Average order value +42 %, UGC volume +600 %, hashtag reach 19 M impressions...

sections.heading: Customer Journey Overhaul
sections.content: We redesigned the end-to-end customer journey, from first-touch social impressions to post-purchase follow-up emails. Customer feedback loops were built directly into the social campaigns.

sections.heading: Organic vs Paid Mix
sections.content: By shifting budget towards high-performing organic posts and leveraging boosted influencer content, we increased efficiency and amplified authentic engagement.

title: NeoFit App: 50K Downloads in Two Weeks with Zero Paid Media
subtitle: A teaser campaign, waitlist gamification, and creator partnerships turned hype into installs.
author: Sofia Ahmed

sections.heading: Gamified Waitlist
sections.content: We built a referral leaderboard: every share earned early‑access badges and in‑app perks...

sections.heading: Creator Blitz
sections.content: Fitness YouTubers teased exclusive challenges; Instagram coaches hosted live workouts...
sections.quote: “Our launch livestream peaked at 18 K concurrent viewers.”

sections.heading: Launch Numbers
sections.content: 50 K downloads, 25 K active users day one, App Store #2 in Health & Fitness...

sections.heading: Tech Stack Integration
sections.content: We connected the waitlist system with the app backend to ensure seamless onboarding at launch. Automated triggers rewarded referrals in real time.

sections.heading: Post-Launch Optimization
sections.content: monitoring allowed us to identify churn risk cohorts, optimize push notification cadences, and introduce in-app challenges to maintain daily active users.
